---
title: 最好用的markdown编辑器汇总
date: 2016-11-15T15:08:59
updated: Tue Nov 15 2016 15:09:28 GMT+0800 (CST)
comments: 1
categories:
tags:
  - JavaScript
permalink: best-markdown-editor
---


> 收集了一下好用的markdown编辑器，都曾经大量使用，都爱不释手。选择恐惧症。。。


<!--more-->


# 1. [stackedit](https://stackedit.io/editor#)

- 在线编辑器
- 支持同步google drive，github等

![stackedit](https://images-manager.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/static/markdown-editor/1.png)

[beta版](https://app.classeur.io/#!/files/f4MKwIwGBljQ9kG2qP9s)

![stackedit-beta](https://images-manager.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/static/markdown-editor/2.png)


# 2. [dillinger](http://dillinger.io/ )

- 在线编辑器

- 支持同步google drive，Dropbox

![stackedit-beta](https://images-manager.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/static/markdown-editor/4.png)

![stackedit-beta](https://images-manager.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/static/markdown-editor/5.png)


- 更有意思的是，你可以下载它的[源码](https://github.com/joemccann/dillinger/releases)到本地，启动它运行。利于搭建静态博客。

```bash
$ cd dillinger
$ npm install -d
$ node app
```

![stackedit-beta](https://images-manager.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/static/markdown-editor/6.png)



# 3. [作业部落](https://www.zybuluo.com/mdeditor)

- 在线编辑器+客户端
- 部分功能付费

![stackedit-beta](https://images-manager.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/static/markdown-editor/7.png)

### [作业部落客户端](https://www.zybuluo.com/cmd/)

![stackedit-beta](https://images-manager.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/static/markdown-editor/9.png)

![stackedit-beta](https://images-manager.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/static/markdown-editor/8.png)


# 4. [MEditor.md](https://pandao.github.io/editor.md/)

- 开源在线markdown编辑器

![stackedit-beta](https://images-manager.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/static/markdown-editor/12.png)

# 5. [markdownpad](http://markdownpad.com/)

- 客户端

- 只支持Windows

![stackedit-beta](https://images-manager.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/static/markdown-editor/13.png)

# 6. [MOU](http://25.io/mou/)

mou是非常轻量级的markdown编辑器，为止到现在唯一让我体验不好的地方就是不支持目录的功能。

![stackedit-beta](https://images-manager.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/static/markdown-editor/10.png)

# 7. [还有一些字体看起来不太友好的](https://jbt.github.io/markdown-editor/#)

![stackedit-beta](https://images-manager.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/static/markdown-editor/11.png)


**那么问题来了，你在用哪一款呢？**
